translations: n.代表（on behalf of）；因为，为了……的利益（in/on behalf of）；就……而言，在……一方（on behalf of）

phrs.translation: 为了某人；代表...一方；为了某人的利益

sentences.sentence: She was nominated to speak on our behalf.
sentences.translation: 她被指派代表我们发言。

sentences.sentence: Your proxy will need to sign the form on your behalf.
sentences.translation: 你的代理人将须代表你在表格上签字。

sentences.sentence: She made an emotional public appeal on her son's behalf.
sentences.translation: 她代表儿子作了感动人心的公开呼吁。
